Changelog
=========

0.2.2 - 15 Jan. 2010
--------------------
* Create import directory if it does not exist.

0.2.1 - 15 Jan. 2010
--------------------
* New release to fix an installation bug. 

0.2 - 28 Jan. 2009
------------------
* Initial release as an egg.

0.2 - 10 Dec. 2003
------------------
* Added original permission, changed 'leave' flag default to off 

0.1 - 11 Nov. 2003
------------------
* Initial version
